text: haey brasenbae kmean kar braosa bratan robsa a l laoh ning kar anet sraleanh robsa trong mk leu anak( mou ham meat) te noh brakadchea krom muoy knongchamnaom puokke( puok kbat) ban sa me rch bamnng knong kar thveu aoy anak v nge v ng cheaminkhan . bo nde puokke min ach thveu aoy norna mneak v nge v ng krawpi khluon robsa puokke laey . haey puokke ka min ach bangk krohthnak dl anak saumbite b ndi ch ban der . haey a l laoh ban banhchouh mk aoy anak nouv kompir( kuor an) ning pheap chhleasavei haey trong ban bangrien anak nouv avei del anak mintean doeng . haey kar braosa bratan robsa a l laoh mk leu anak ku thomtheng bamphot
